challenges.title: 10-Minute Workout
challenges.description: A short daily workout to keep your body moving. No gym required — 10 minutes at home counts.

challenges.title: 16-Hour Fasting
challenges.description: Skip breakfast, eat in an 8-hour window. One of the most researched longevity habits.

challenges.title: 1-Minute Cold Shower
challenges.description: Finish your shower with 60 seconds of cold water. Builds mental resilience, one day at a time.

challenges.title: Zero Doomscroll
challenges.description: No mindless social media scrolling. Replace the habit with something intentional.

challenges.title: 16-Hour Offscreen
challenges.description: Keep screens off for 16 hours of the day. Reclaim your attention and your evenings.

challenges.title: No Coffee
challenges.description: Skip the caffeine hit. Explore what your natural energy levels feel like.

challenges.title: No Eating Out
challenges.description: Cook every meal yourself. Save money, eat better, rediscover the kitchen.

challenges.title: No Added Sugar
challenges.description: Cut all added sugars from your diet. Read labels, reset your palate.

challenges.title: Ketogenic Diet
challenges.description: High fat, low carb, every day. A metabolic reset that demands daily commitment.

challenges.title: 20-Minute Walk
challenges.description: Step outside and walk for 20 minutes. The simplest habit with outsized benefits.

challenges.title: 10,000 Steps
challenges.description: Hit your daily step goal with intention. Every walk counts toward the streak.

challenges.title: Zero Alcohol
challenges.description: No drinks. Full clarity, better sleep, real savings — one day at a time.

challenges.title: 10-Minute Stretch
challenges.description: Dedicate 10 minutes to stretching every day. Your future self will thank you.

challenges.title: 5-Minute Breathwork
challenges.description: Five minutes of intentional breathing. Box breath, 4-7-8, or whatever grounds you.

challenges.title: 1-Page Journaling
challenges.description: Write one page every day. Stream of consciousness, gratitude, or goals — just write.
